text: Sweet Liberty is a 1986 American comedy movie directed by Alan Alda (who also stars) and also starring Michelle Pfeiffer, Michael Caine, Bob Hoskins, Lise Hilboldt, Lillian Gish, Saul Rubinek. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1986 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies about filmmaking Category:Movies about educators Category:Movies set in North Carolina
title: Sweet Liberty
